lines.text: There's nothing to see here, miss. Just move along.
And allow you to continue to abuse this man?
How would you like to spend the night in jail on a prostitution charge?
How would you like to die in a state of mortal sin?
We offer temporary lodging in our church for children who have lost their way. You'd be more than welcome.
In a church! I couldn't possibly!

[to Veronica's mother]
Be of good cheer, because your beloved daughter has been sanctioned by the First Cause.
What sort of doctor, a priest?

[Showing assailant's eviscerated spinal column to Victimized Woman]
Keep this. Look upon it to allay this memory.

My name is Veronica Maria Theresa Iscariot of Hell, the only daughter of Theresa Agnes Maria Iscariot and Helliken Pontius Aleppi Iscariot, son of Curly Bird Pontius Aleppi Iscariot and Maria Theresa Iscariot of the House of Agnes, related by marriage to...
...I want you inside of me, Max.
You don't have to recite lines from the movie.
I want to be as alluring to you as that actress was to her beloved Tony.
I'm not Tony and this is not a movie.
